#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;

unsigned long long f[25];
char ans[26];

int changer (int n)
{
	int i = 25;
	unsigned long long k = f[n];
	while (k > 0) {
		unsigned long long r = k%10;
		ans[i] = '0' + r;
		i--;
		k = k/10;
	}
	return i+1;
}

void precompute ()
{
	f[1] = 0;
	f[2] = 1;
	for (int i = 3 ; i <= 22 ; i++)
	{
		f[i] = f[i-1]*(i-1);
		f[i] += f[i-2]*(i-2);
	}
}

int main ()
{
	precompute ();
	int t;
	scanf ("%d",&t);
	while (t--)
	{
		int k,n,count = 0;
		scanf ("%d %d",&k,&n);
		if (k == 0 && n == 1) {
			printf ("%d\n",1);
			continue;
		}
		else if (k < 10)
		{
			for (int i = changer (n) ; i <= 25 ; i++)
				if (ans[i] == '0' + k) count++;
		}
		else if (k == 100)
		{
			for (int i = changer (n) + 2 ; i <= 25 ; i++) {
				if (ans[i] == '0' && ans[i-1] == '0' && ans[i-2] == '1')
					count++;
			}
		}
		else {
			for (int i = changer(n) + 1 ; i <= 25 ; i++) {
				if (ans[i] == '0' + k%10 && ans[i-1] == '0' + (k/10)%10)
					count++;
			}
		}
		printf ("%d\n",count);
	}

	return 0;
}
